title: Blue Skies Above Flight School
description: Professional pilot training academy at Lanett Municipal Airport (7A3) serving Alabama and Georgia

sections.headline: Your Pilot Training Academy
sections.subhead: Flight school between Alabama and Georgia
sections.description: Nestled in the heart of Lanett, Alabama. Lanett Municipal Airport 7A3

sections.content: Are you considering a professional flight program at a university?

sections.heading: Preparing future pilots to launch their aviation careers
sections.description: Discover why aspiring pilots in Auburn and throughout the Alabama area trust Blue Skies Above to turn their aviation dreams into reality.

sections.heading: The best time to start flying is now

steps.title: Start a Conversation
steps.description: The first step in pilot training is reaching out to a flight school.

steps.title: Take Your First Flight Lesson
steps.description: Also known as a discovery flight, take the controls of the aircraft and fly the plane.

steps.title: Start Training
steps.description: You've got the best flight school in Lanett, AL supporting you every step of the way.

sections.heading: Your Opportunity
sections.description: The time to become a pilot is now. With demand at an all time high and the world more than ever needing more pilots, this is your chance.

steps.title: Contact Blue Skies Above
steps.description: Reaching out to a flight school to understand how the pilot training process works is the first step in your pilot training journey.

steps.title: Take a Discovery Flight
steps.description: Also known as an introductory flight, a discovery flight is your first flight lesson. Pair up with a certified flight instructor and you fly the plane.

steps.title: Start Flight Training
steps.description: You'll pair up and work with a CFI (Certified Flight Instructor) to start flight training. Gain the necessary skills and knowledge to pass your written and practical exams.

sections.heading: Next Steps
sections.subheading: Visit Blue Skies Above Professional Flight Instruction
sections.description: Visit our flight school, start pilot training and join the family, like & follow us on social media.

sections.heading: Get Your FREE Pilot Training Guide Book!
sections.description: We have a free booklet which explains everything you need to know for your pilot certificate.

sections.heading: Blue Skies Above is a fun, welcoming place to begin your journey as a pilot
sections.description: Our team is committed to providing expert guidance, personalized training, and unwavering support as you work toward your aviation goals.
sections.video_title: How to Perform a Walk Around Inspection of a Cessna 172
